DTS:LogProvider.DTS:Description: Writes log entries for events to a SQL Server database
DTS:LogProvider.DTS:ObjectName: SSIS log provider for SQL Server

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

DTS:Executable.DTS:refId: Package\Calculo Punto B - Actualiza Tabla AMPS_PUNTOB
DTS:Executable.DTS:ObjectName: Calculo Punto B - Actualiza Tabla AMPS_PUNTOB
DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
DECLARE @Periodo INT SET @Periodo = (Select top 1 H.id_periodo from DW_SALUD.dbo.D_PERIODO H where H.vigente_consumo=1 group by H.id_periodo order by H.id_periodo desc)
SELECT id_periodo, id_persona, id_plan_producto, SUM(imp_prest_amb_acep) as importe INTO #TMP_AMB FROM DW_SALUD.dbo.H_ORD_AMB_DET C JOIN DW_SALUD.dbo.D_PRESTACION P on C.id_prestacion = P.id_prestacion where id_producto = 18 and id_periodo in (SELECT MAX(id_periodo) FROM DW_SALUD.dbo.AUX_PERIODO_MES_BORRA) and P.id_accion_farmacologica in (30,877) and C.id_reintegro in ('F','R') and id_persona in (SELECT id_persona FROM DW_SALUD.dbo.H_COMP_GRUPO_ACTIVO WHERE id_producto = 18 GROUP BY id_persona) GROUP BY id_periodo, id_persona, id_plan_producto
SELECT id_periodo, id_persona, id_plan_producto, SUM(imp_prest_int_acep) as importe INTO #TMP_INT FROM DW_SALUD.dbo.H_ORD_INT_DET C JOIN DW_SALUD.dbo.D_PRESTACION P on C.id_prestacion = P.id_prestacion where id_producto = 18 and id_periodo in (SELECT MAX(id_periodo) FROM DW_SALUD.dbo.AUX_PERIODO_MES_BORRA) and P.id_accion_farmacologica in (30,877) and C.id_reintegro in ('F','R') and id_persona in (SELECT id_persona FROM DW_SALUD.dbo.H_COMP_GRUPO_ACTIVO WHERE id_producto = 18 GROUP BY id_persona) GROUP BY id_periodo, id_persona, id_plan_producto
INSERT INTO AMPS_PUNTOB (id_periodo, id_persona, plan_producto, Importe) SELECT A.id_periodo, A.id_persona, A.id_plan_producto, SUM(IsNull(CAST(A.importe AS FLOAT),0)+IsNull(CAST(I.importe as FLOAT),0)) AS Importe FROM #TMP_AMB A FULL OUTER JOIN #TMP_INT I on A.id_periodo = I.id_periodo and A.id_persona = I.id_persona GROUP BY A.id_periodo, A.id_persona, A.id_plan_producto
UPDATE AMPS_PUNTOB SET Nombre = P.Nombre, Apellido = P.Apellido FROM AMPS_PUNTOB A JOIN DW_SALUD.dbo.D_PERSONAS P on A.id_persona = P.id_persona

component.name: Excel Destination

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

connection.description: The OLE DB runtime connection used to access the database.
connection.name: OleDbConnection
